name: Oracom Video File
summary: Learn about .ORV files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: Oracom is a Korean company and therefore most products are localized in Korean.

description: Video file saved in the Oracom video format, a format used by some Oracom hardware devices; saves the video in a proprietary format but can be played back using a program called "Movie Viewer" that is typically supplied with Oracom products.
